step.description: Step factor to increment/decrement the value.

range.description: When speficed, allows two boundary values to be picked.

disabled.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

tabindex.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.

aria-labelledby.description: Establishes relationships between the component and label(s) where its value should be one or more element IDs.

aria-label.description: Used to define a string that labels the element.

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: change
events.description: Callback to invoke on value change.

events.name: slideend
events.description: Callback to invoke when slide ends.
